description: Main entry point for a Flutter application that sets up the app with a basic home page displaying a message indicating the app is being generated.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, sets up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a title and dynamic content.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, builds a scaffold with an app bar and centered message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MyApp and _MyHomePageState widgets.
